title: The George Foreman 4-Serving Removable Plate Grill
description: Cook quick and tasty meals for the whole family with the George Foreman GRP360R Grill. The 4-serving area of the grill is ideal for burgers and chicken for the whole family, or for a smaller meal complete with grilled vegetables. The improved George Tough non-stick coating is 3x more durable than previous models, and removes the need for excess oil and butter. Plus, removable grill plates are dishwasher-safe, making cleanup that much easier.

asset.author: George Foreman Cooking
asset.description:
Cook quick and tasty meals for the whole family with the George Foreman GRP360R Grill. The 4-serving area of the grill is ideal for burgers and chicken for the whole family, or for a smaller meal complete with grilled vegetables. The improved George Tough non-stick coating is 3x more durable than previous models, and removes the need for excess oil and butter. Plus, removable grill plates are dishwasher-safe, making cleanup that much easier. 

Learn more here: http://www.georgeforemancooking.com/products/removable-plate-grills/grp360r-red-360-grill.aspx

transcripts: George Foreman quick tasty meals from the convenience of your own kitchen the George Foreman 4 serving grill creates delicious grilled meals that feed the whole family the patented sloped grilling surface removes up to forty two percent of that which collects in the dishwasher safe trip pan the exclusive George tough nonstick coating is three times more durable than previous George Foreman coatings it removes the need for excess oil and butter during grilling plus the plates are fully removable and dishwasher safe for fast and easy clean up the one-inch floating hinge adjust to the thickness of food maintaining juiciness and flavor stay in control with dual indicator lights that show when the grill is plugged in and when it's preheated the George Foreman 4 serving grill add a grilling punch to your countertop.
